short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swaps the word 'Santa' with the word 'Satan'; great for the holidays.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Special request from a friend--changes the word "Santa" to "Satan" to make your holiday experience better. Also will make cities in California look a lot more evil so caveat emptor.
